item.title: Informed, Random Walk
item.description: Background Stripe Press published a beautiful copy of “The Art of Doing Science and Engineering” by Richard Hamming: Aside from being a wonderful read, the cover of this book (which is an apt analogy for the learning process) features an intriguing pattern. As I was reading the book while traveling, I was nerd sniped into designing an algorithm which would make such a pattern. This post is an explication of my solution.
